item.title: Part 4, More Loops
item.description: And we’re back (after a slight hiatus)! Let another day of Python begin!! So let’s back up for a second. We can make variables really easily: x=5 y=6 z=7 a=8 b=9#and so forth And right now if we wanted to print out all the numbers between 1 and 100 we could do this: num=0 while num <= 100: print(num) num = num +1 This will print all the numbers between 0 and 100 (inclusive).
